bug.author: sjperkins
bug.description:
StagingArea (and perhaps other structures in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/data_flow_ops.py>data_flow_ops.py</denchmark-link> ) are not present in the python documentation. They are however mentioned in the 1.0.0 and 1.1.0 <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/346bd59b3c99055c3fdcbc0d0b0710418f48c5c6/RELEASE.md>release notes</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-h:h3>What other attempted solutions have you tried?</denchmark-h>
A search of the docs for <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/s/results/?q=StagingArea>"StagingArea"</denchmark-link> doesn't reveal any of the docstrings present in <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/python/ops/data_flow_ops.py>data_flow_ops.py</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-link:https://www.tensorflow.org/api_docs/cc/class/tensorflow/ops/stage>Stage</denchmark-link> and Unstage are present in the C++ documentation.

comments.comment:
StagingArea was added under tf.contrib.staging.StagingArea with this commit 8 days ago: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/commit/90733a8024532f6993d11f0a89deaecb2bba59fe>90733a8</denchmark-link>
This will allow the documentation to be generated for it. The new docs should go up this coming weekend.
